awd_titl_txt: Dissertation Research:  Systematics and Evolution of the    Cryptophygidae
awd_abstract_narration: This project will produce a systematic revision,                                clarifying relationships of the members of the family                           Cryptophagidae, a group of beetles with many members                            that are fungus feeders.  Character traits of adult                             morphology will be investigated in this analysis and                            computer assisted methods of examining data will be                             used.  Interesting patterns of shifts between fungus                            feeding and plant feeding and loss of flight                                    capabilities among different species will be explored.
